subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Italy set for CIA rendition trial

06/08/07 12:27 AM, EDT
Hours before U.S. President George W. Bush visits Italy, 26 U.S. citizens go on trial in absentia in Milan on Friday accused of carrying out one of Washington's most controversial policies in its war on terrorism.
FULL STORY
